title: Better Auth Verification

constraint_check.notes: Adds new dependency (better-auth) when Supabase Auth already available in existing package

logic_check.notes: No native auth.uid() support. RLS policies require custom JWT claim extraction. More boilerplate for equivalent functionality.

fv_rationale: Works but adds unnecessary complexity. Manual RLS integration required. New API to learn when Supabase Auth is simpler.
feedback: Would only choose if Supabase Auth had a specific limitation we needed to work around. Currently no such limitation exists.
